description:
Tool to work with backup files generated by the Signal android application (https://signal.org/). The tool is provided as-is, there may be bugs. The tool and it's creator are not affiliated with or endorsed by the Signal Foundation.

#### Package updates
   
New versions of this package are published automatically via the `update.ps1` script (viewable in the package source on GitHub).
summary: Tool to work with Signal Backup files.
author: bepaald
